summary: Kyoto, an ancient city in Japan, is known for its rich history and culture. It was once the imperial capital for over 1,000 years. With a population of around 1.46 million, it's the ninth largest city in Japan. Kyoto is famous for its beautiful temples, shrines, and gardens, many of which are UNESCO World Heritage Sites. The city is also home to Nintendo and prestigious Kyoto University. Its cultural significance makes it a top tourist attraction.
title: Kyoto
